ai-patthana18.2:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the teachings,)
ai-patthana18.2:0.3_0: There are causes and conditions for the sake of nymphs.
ai-patthana18.2:1.1_0: For the sake of causes and doesn’t cause the reason for the sake of purification of mind.
ai-patthana18.2:2.1_0: For the sake of based on unity ...
ai-patthana18.2:2.1_1: Or to results in each other’s ...
ai-patthana18.2:3.1_0: There is no cause for the sake of cause, not for the sake of purification of mind.
ai-patthana18.2:4.1_0: No cause for the sake of purification by lust ... for the sake of purification of mind.
